summary: An older housewife discovers she has a knack for solving puzzles.
cast: María Onetto|Gabriel Goity|Arturo Goetz|Henny Trayles|Felipe Villanueva|Julián Doregger|Nora Zinski|Marcela Guerty|Mirta Wons|Mercedes Fraile|Denise Groesman|Jimena Ruiz-Echazú|Pacho Guerty|Nestor Caniglia|Carolina Adamovsky|Leticia Gaspari|Bernarda Pagés|Andrés Zurita|Luciano Ripodas
title: Rompecabezas
